message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its value and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I propose a special introductory offer of $7,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth $8,000 at a highly competitive price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.
